title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 370: Featuring Ryan Carter & Bob Stauffer
description:
On Episode 370 of Spittin’ Chicles the guys are joined by Ryan Carter and Oilers reporter Bob Stauffer. Bob joined (1:04:25) to discuss all the drama in Edmonton, including the Leon Draisaitl vs Jim Matheson press conference. Bob also talked about potential trades the Oilers could make, keeping McDavid happy, and some old Whit stories. But first, the guys open the show talking about the crazy weekend in the NFL, Chris Pronger's jersey retirement, Willie O’Ree and tons more. The guys also discuss the racial incidents that occurred this past weekend. The boys are then joined (2:12:05) by Ryan Carter to talk about his career and some hilarious stories along the way. The guys wrap up talking about the Habs new GM, Star Wars Jerseys, and Clark Gillies.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
